cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 18th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 18th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Sleep soundly in a cozy single bed, enjoying both safety and affordability. Option for a solo journey or gather your crew in a group room. Itâ€™s the perfect setup to make new friends and connect along the way!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: If the idea of enduring snorers in a six-bed dorm doesnâ€™t appeal to you, but you still crave the companionship of a loved one, family member, or friend, opt for our queen-shared room. It offers ample space for comfort and connection.
